name: Rhythm of the Gods (S_Doyle)
description:
Created for MiniJam 63: Future

Rhythm of the Gods is a game set in the far future where fish have surpassed humanity and became their gods. the player must play the songs of the gods in order to please the deities and prevent them from destroying humanity.

Feedback is much appreciated!

Enter full screen for best experience

Background Music from - Benside.com

Piano Notes from -  Freesound.org
